name: Ammo vs Onslaught
description:
Ocean going UFO generates tidal waves, upward protrusions of ground, and half a dozen other super weapons to sweep clean the map icon (on the bottom right), sweep clean the space of space invaders.

20 levels of increasing action, with random variations.

Controls:

< mouse> controls player view direction.

fires the selected weapon

forward thrust

<1>-<9>,<0> number keys select weapon

keys control the forward/backward motion of the player.

keys roll the player view.

keys strafe left and right

key when held displays chase view

key toggles display of the weapon rack

key toggles chase view of your UFO

toggle screen buffering

key toggles access to the resolution menu

ape key takes you to the main menu lobby, and from there quits the game
